column2: geom_line(aes(x = x, y = y, color = "STATA, SPSS รณ SAS"), data = subset(pdata, x > 0)) +
geom_line(aes(x = x, y = 0, color = "STATA, SPSS รณ SAS"), data = subset(pdata, x < 0)) +

annotate("text", x = 0.5, y = -0.9, label = "No uses R") +
values = c("STATA, SPSS รณ SAS" = "tomato3",
